pkgmetadata.longdescription: Adaptive Bootstrap Inference for Mediation Analysis with Enhanced Statistical Power // Assess whether and how a specific continuous or categorical exposure affects the outcome of interest through one- or multi-dimensional mediators using an adaptive bootstrap (AB) approach. The AB method allows to make inference for composite null hypotheses of no mediation effect, providing valid type I error control and thus optimizes statistical power. For more technical details, refer to He, Song and Xu (2024) doi:10.1093/jrsssb/qkad129.
